API & Javascript

COVID19 News Feed

Task

"COVID19 News Feed" is a webpage application made with NewsAPI and pure Javascript. The daily updated news about COVID19 is generated once the page is open. Users can choose their preferred media source to scan through the news lists or click into the specific list and read more.

Based on the current pandemic, people are anxious about things happening around them. This slight application can ease online reading by focusing on the right content.
